title: FS: Ed Abbaticchio Brown Sleeves Piedmont PSA 2 (well it was)
author: Ed_Hutchinson

posts.post_title: FS: Ed Abbaticchio Brown Sleeves Piedmont PSA 2 (well it was)
posts.post_content:
Card was graded PSA 2 (although there is back paper loss, which I think makes it an automatic 1 nowadays) but the case was cracked in shipping. I am looking to sell the raw card for 15 shipped PWE. I will include the PSA 2 label if you would like to get it re-slabbed.

LMK if interested- pictures can definitely be provided

Thanks
Ed

Ed, I will take it if available.

Thanks  

Pm sent.
